titles: A persuasion from papistrie vvrytten chiefely to the obstinate, determined, and dysobedient English papists, who are herein named & proued English enimies and extreme enimies to Englande. Which persuasion, all the Queenes Maiesties subiectes, fauoring the Pope or his religion, will reade or heare aduisedlye ...
author: Lupton, Thomas.
publisher: Imprinted by Henrie Bynneman dwelling in Thamis Streete neare Baynards Castel,
